meaningMnemonic: From my <radical>mouth</radical> I have told you <radical>seven</radical> times not to do that. Now I have to <kanji>scold</kanji> you.
readingMnemonic: What were you doing wrong that caused me to <kanji>scold</kanji> you? You were feeding the <reading>鹿</reading> (しか). If you feed them they'll never be able to feed themselves!
